title: Status In Campaign Progression Changed
description: Use to capture details when a lead's status in a campaign changes.

xdm:newStatusID.title: New Status ID
xdm:newStatusID.description: ID of the lead's new status in the campaign.

xdm:newStatusName.title: New Status Name
xdm:newStatusName.description: Friendly name of the lead's new status in the campaign.

xdm:oldStatusID.title: Old Status ID
xdm:oldStatusID.description: ID of the lead's previous status in the campaign.

xdm:oldStatusName.title: Old Status Name
xdm:oldStatusName.description: Friendly name of the lead's previous status in the campaign.

xdm:reason.title: Reason
xdm:reason.description: Reason for the change in the lead's status.

xdm:isAcquiredBy.title: Is Acquired By
xdm:isAcquiredBy.description: Boolean indicating if lead was acquired by the campaign.

xdm:isSuccessful.title: Is Successful
xdm:isSuccessful.description: Boolean indicating if there was a change in the lead's status.
